title: Chapter 988 - Where Is Huo Yao?
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 988 - Where Is Huo Yao?

Huo Yao was seated cross-legged within a palace when he suddenly opened his eyes and smiled. “Junior Apprentice Brother, are you willing to accompany me somewhere?”

Ye Luo said icily from a shadowy corner, “It seems to me that if you want to live, you’d best kneel, here and now, and wait for Master to punish you. If you turn over a new leaf and repent sincerely, he might well spare your life.”

A hint of ferocity shone in the depths of Huo Yao’s gaze, but outwardly, he laughed heartily. “Rest assured, I have no intention of fleeing without a fight.”

He rose, then said, “I want to go to the Divine Cave of the Six Paths. It’s not far from Broken Souls Ridge. There’s a mysterious bronze temple there, and it seems highly likely that it hides secrets connected to reincarnation. If you don’t come, I’ll leave without you.”

With that, Huo Yao put his hands behind his back, turned, and left.

In his shadowed corner, Ye Luo frowned. Nonetheless, in the end, he got up and followed.

He was certain that Huo Yao was up to something, but he had no choice but to keep an eye on him.

If Huo Yao escaped, he wouldn’t be able to face his master.

The entrance to the Divine Cave of the Six Paths.
